image_description: Patricia at a control desk with multiple monitors showing kanban boards and agent status indicators. Speech bubble: 'Let's ship it!' Warm salmon/teal brand colors.
Patricia holding up platform icons (Apple, Linux penguin) with download arrows. Binary code or terminal window in background. Call-to-action feel.
Patricia waving welcome, pointing to a simple 3-step path diagram (Install → Configure → Launch). Friendly onboarding vibe.
Patricia sorting colorful tickets labeled INV/FIX/FEAT/SPIKE/TASK into priority lanes. Each ticket type has distinct glyph visible.
Patricia conducting/directing multiple smaller robot agents (some autonomous running, one paired with speech bubble). Orchestration visual.
Patricia moving tickets across Queue → In-Progress → Completed columns. Classic kanban board with brand colors.
Patricia connecting Claude and Gemini logos with cables/wires to a central hub. Integration/connection theme.
Patricia inside a split terminal window with multiple panes, each showing agent activity. Multiplexer visualization.
Patricia at a terminal typing commands. Code/terminal aesthetic with --help output visible.
Patricia's hands on a keyboard with key labels floating (j/k, Tab, L, P). Quick-reference cheatsheet feel.
